com.amadeus.android.domain.air.apis

Interface FlightDelayPredictionApi


  • @JvmSuppressWildcards
public FlightDelayPredictionApi

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlightDelayPredictionApi

        public FlightDelayPredictionApi()

    • Method Detail

      • getFlightDelayPrediction

        @GET
 @Nullable
java.lang.Object getFlightDelayPrediction(@Query @NotNull
                                                          java.lang.String originLocationCode,
                                                          @Query @NotNull
                                                          java.lang.String destinationLocationCode,
                                                          @Query @NotNull
                                                          java.lang.String departureDate,
                                                          @Query @NotNull
                                                          java.lang.String departureTime,
                                                          @Query @NotNull
                                                          java.lang.String arrivalDate,
                                                          @Query @NotNull
                                                          java.lang.String arrivalTime,
                                                          @Query @NotNull
                                                          java.lang.String aircraftCode,
                                                          @Query @NotNull
                                                          java.lang.String carrierCode,
                                                          @Query @NotNull
                                                          java.lang.String flightNumber,
                                                          @Query @NotNull
                                                          java.lang.String duration,
                                                          @NotNull
                                                          kotlin.coroutines.Continuation<retrofit2.Response> p)

        Return the delay segment where the flight is likely to lay. This machine learning API is based on a prediction model that takes the input of the user -time, carrier, airport and aircraft information- and predict the segment where the flight is likely to lay. ## Request example: GET https://test.api.amadeus.com/v1/travel/predictions/flight-delay?originLocationCode=NCE&destinationLocationCode=IST&departureDate=2020-08-01&departureTime=18:20:00&arrivalDate=2020-08-01&arrivalTime=22:15:00&aircraftCode=321&carrierCode=TK&flightNumber=1816&duration=PT31H10M ## Response examples: { \"data\": {\"id\":\"TK1816NCEIST20200801\",\"probability\":\"0.13336977\",\"result\":\"LESS_THAN_30_MINUTES\",\"subType\":\"flight-delay\",\"type\":\"prediction\"},{\"id\":\"TK1816NCEIST20200801\",\"probability\":\"0.42023364\",\"result\":\"BETWEEN_30_AND_60_MINUTES\",\"subType\":\"flight-delay\",\"type\":\"prediction\"},{\"id\":\"TK1816NCEIST20200801\",\"probability\":\"0.34671372\",\"result\":\"BETWEEN_60_AND_120_MINUTES\",\"subType\":\"flight-delay\",\"type\":\"prediction\"},{\"id\":\"TK1816NCEIST20200801\",\"probability\":\"0.09968289\",\"result\":\"OVER_120_MINUTES_OR_CANCELLED\",\"subType\":\"flight-delay\",\"type\":\"prediction\"}, \"meta\": { \"count\": 4, \"links\": { \"self\": \"https://test.api.amadeus.com/v1/travel/predictions/flight-delay?originLocationCode=NCE&destinationLocationCode=IST&departureDate=2020-08-01&departureTime=18:20:00&arrivalDate=2020-08-01&arrivalTime=22:15:00&aircraftCode=321&carrierCode=TK&flightNumber=1816&duration=PT31H10M\" } } } The endpoint is owned by defaultname service owner

        Parameters:
        originLocationCode - city/airport IATA code to which the traveler is departing, e.g. PAR for Paris (required)
        destinationLocationCode - city/airport IATA code to which the traveler is departing, e.g. PAR for Paris (required)
        departureDate - the date on which the traveler will depart from the origin to go to the destination. Dates are specified in the ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2019-12-25 (required)
        departureTime - local time relative to originLocationCode on which the traveler will depart from the origin. Time respects ISO 8601 standard. e.g. 13:22:00 (required)
        arrivalDate - the date on which the traveler will arrive to the destination from the origin. Dates are specified in the ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2019-12-25 (required)
        arrivalTime - local time relative to destinationLocationCode on which the traveler will arrive to destination. Time respects ISO 8601 standard. e.g. 13:22:00 (required)
        aircraftCode - IATA aircraft code (http://www.flugzeuginfo.net/table_accodes_iata_en.php) (required)
        carrierCode - airline / carrier code (required)
        flightNumber - flight number as assigned by the carrier (required)
        duration - flight duration in ISO8601 PnYnMnDTnHnMnS format, e.g. PT2H10M (required)
        See Also:
        {\"id\":\"TK1816NCEIST20200801\",\"probability\":\"0.13336977\",\"result\":\"LESS_THAN_30_MINUTES\",\"subType\":\"flight-delay\",\"type\":\"prediction\"},{\"id\":\"TK1816NCEIST20200801\",\"probability\":\"0.42023364\",\"result\":\"BETWEEN_30_AND_60_MINUTES\",\"subType\":\"flight-delay\",\"type\":\"prediction\"},{\"id\":\"TK1816NCEIST20200801\",\"probability\":\"0.34671372\",\"result\":\"BETWEEN_60_AND_120_MINUTES\",\"subType\":\"flight-delay\",\"type\":\"prediction\"},{\"id\":\"TK1816NCEIST20200801\",\"probability\":\"0.09968289\",\"result\":\"OVER_120_MINUTES_OR_CANCELLED\",\"subType\":\"flight-delay\",\"type\":\"prediction\"}
